title: Rage And Racial Skill— Reaper's Wrath (Part 6)
body:
Rage And Racial Skill— Reaper's Wrath (Part 6)

The moment Evan saw the dead body of the green-haired elf in the Dark Room, anger that sought to destroy everything erupted from the depths of his soul. A strong urge to kill all the beast people who had come to capture him filled his heart.

(Your BloodLust skill has been activated)

The killing intent filling Evan's heart reached a point where his BloodLust skill activated on its own and as the BloodLust skill activated, he began to lose his sanity.

Under normal circumstances, Evan wouldn't have lost his sanity due to his high spiritual power. However, at present, his mind was extremely chaotic, and the overwhelming killing intent filling his heart was too much.
